name: UpdateOrganization
description:
Update the details of a Trello organization.

This tool updates an organization's information in Trello using the organization's ID. Call this when changes to organization details are needed.

parameters.name: organization_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Trello organization to update.

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the Organization

parameters.name: new_organization_name
parameters.description: A unique name for the organization with at least 3 lowercase letters, underscores, or numbers.

value_schema.description: A new name for the organization. At least 3 lowercase letters, underscores, and numbers. Must be unique

parameters.name: new_display_name
parameters.description: A new display name for the organization. Must be at least 1 character long and not begin or end with a space.

value_schema.description: A new displayName for the organization. Must be at least 1 character long and not begin or end with a space.

parameters.name: organization_description
parameters.description: A new description for the organization in Trello.

value_schema.description: A new description for the organization

parameters.name: organization_website_url
parameters.description: A URL for the organization starting with 'http://', 'https://', or 'null'.

value_schema.description: A URL starting with `http://`, `https://`, or `null`

parameters.name: google_apps_domain
parameters.description: The Google Apps domain to link this organization to.

value_schema.description: The Google Apps domain to link this org to.

parameters.name: google_apps_version
parameters.description: Specifies the Google Apps version to link with the organization. It should be either `1` or `2`.

parameters.name: workspace_board_visibility_restriction
parameters.description: Specifies who on the Workspace can make Workspace visible boards. Acceptable values: `admin`, `none`, `org`.

value_schema.description: Who on the Workspace can make Workspace visible boards. One of `admin`, `none`, `org`

parameters.name: private_board_visibility_restriction
parameters.description: Specifies who can create private boards within the organization. Acceptable values: `admin`, `none`, `org`.

value_schema.description: Who can make private boards. One of: `admin`, `none`, `org`

parameters.name: public_board_visibility_restriction
parameters.description: Specifies who in the workspace can create public boards. Options: 'admin', 'none', 'org'.

value_schema.description: Who on the Workspace can make public boards. One of: `admin`, `none`, `org`

parameters.name: organization_invite_restriction_email
parameters.description: An email address pattern with optional wildcard characters for restricting organization invites.

value_schema.description: An email address with optional wildcard characters. (E.g. `subdomain.*.trello.com`)

parameters.name: workspace_visibility
parameters.description: Sets the visibility of the Workspace page. Options: `private` or `public`.

value_schema.description: Whether the Workspace page is publicly visible. One of: `private`, `public`

parameters.name: allow_external_members
parameters.description: Set to false to prevent non-workspace members from being added to boards in the Workspace.

value_schema.description: Whether non-workspace members can be added to boards inside the Workspace

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A new name for the organization. At least 3 lowercase letters, underscores, and numbers. Must be unique

value_schema.description: A new name for the organization. At least 3 lowercase letters, underscores, and numbers. Must be unique

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: A new displayName for the organization. Must be at least 1 character long and not begin or end with a space.

value_schema.description: A new displayName for the organization. Must be at least 1 character long and not begin or end with a space.

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description: A new description for the organization

value_schema.description: A new description for the organization

parameters.name: website
parameters.description: A URL starting with `http://`, `https://`, or `null`

value_schema.description: A URL starting with `http://`, `https://`, or `null`

parameters.name: prefs/associatedDomain
parameters.description: The Google Apps domain to link this org to.

value_schema.description: The Google Apps domain to link this org to.

parameters.name: prefs/externalMembersDisabled
parameters.description: Whether non-workspace members can be added to boards inside the Workspace

value_schema.description: Whether non-workspace members can be added to boards inside the Workspace

parameters.name: prefs/boardVisibilityRestrict/org
parameters.description: Who on the Workspace can make Workspace visible boards. One of `admin`, `none`, `org`

value_schema.description: Who on the Workspace can make Workspace visible boards. One of `admin`, `none`, `org`

parameters.name: prefs/boardVisibilityRestrict/private
parameters.description: Who can make private boards. One of: `admin`, `none`, `org`

value_schema.description: Who can make private boards. One of: `admin`, `none`, `org`

parameters.name: prefs/boardVisibilityRestrict/public
parameters.description: Who on the Workspace can make public boards. One of: `admin`, `none`, `org`

value_schema.description: Who on the Workspace can make public boards. One of: `admin`, `none`, `org`

parameters.name: prefs/orgInviteRestrict
parameters.description: An email address with optional wildcard characters. (E.g. `subdomain.*.trello.com`)

value_schema.description: An email address with optional wildcard characters. (E.g. `subdomain.*.trello.com`)

parameters.name: prefs/permissionLevel
parameters.description: Whether the Workspace page is publicly visible. One of: `private`, `public`

value_schema.description: Whether the Workspace page is publicly visible. One of: `private`, `public`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Organization

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the Organization
